name: Space Cleaning Machine
description:
Welcome to my little experience about testing unusual control schemes and physics-based object recollection gameplay.  

This is the first game that releases as a part of the Development Misfortunes Collection. This collection of experiences will serve as a way of pushing myself to move on to the next project and keep creating instead of blocking out and losing myself into development hell.

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated :)

How to play:

  • Left-click over your ship's toolset to move it. 
  • Alt+F4 to close the game at any moment.

Extra credits:

  • Skybox by BG Studio
  • City props by 255 pixel studios
  • Office props by Sten Ulfsson
  • More Office props by RRFreelance/PiXelBurner
  • SoundEffects made with ChipTone
  • Fracture Effect made with Unity Libre Fracture
